Considering its quality and the effort put into it, I would like to propose a price of $150 for it. This offer includes a 30-day satisfaction guarantee, during which you can return the product if it doesn't meet your expectations. I look forward to your response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150.

(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer
